title: My Experience
description: Showcasing academic and personal software development projects and achievements:
highlights: Built scalable full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, React.js, and MongoDB, focusing on backend development and database management.
Developed a real-time chat application using WebSockets and MongoDB, showcasing WebSocket implementation and full-stack development skills.
Deployed applications with Docker for scalability in cloud environments.
Integrated Amazon RDS with backend applications, demonstrating expertise in cloud-based database management and scalable architectures.
